2019.question: Explain any one of the following:

sub_questions.a: “You’re an actor,” he sneered. “There’s absolutely no future for a boy like you.”
sub_questions.b: “What? That means he will be here for weeks! Ministers don’t see people for weeks, months! Oh, my God!”
sub_questions.c: “You’re a brave boy and get married…… Just do me a favour and leave me in peace.”
